coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed! Eric Schmidt , a tech industry veteran who was brought in 10 years ago to provide what some at the company called "adult supervision" for Google's young founders, will take on the role of executive chairman,

all the attention and prosaic duties that come with running one of world's most scrutinized companies. "I don't think Eric Schmidt was pushed. I think he jumped," said Ken Auletta , author of Googled: The End of the World As We Know It. "I think Eric Schmidt is burned out." ," he said in response to a question about his plans. Eric Schmidt , 55, may be considering a career as a television host, the New York Post reported Monday. Ken Auletta , author of Googled: The End of the World as We Know It, told Bloomberg TV last week that Eric Schmidt may be weighing a role in the Obama administration.
